name: SpaceRat
description: SPACE RAT POLYGON is the first of its kind revolutionary yield farming protocol built on Matic Network. The mechanism is simple: You earn $MATIC just by holding $SRAT in your wallet. Three functions occur during each trade: Reflection, LP Acquisition, & Burn. With the help of our community and our marketing plans, we are confident that we have what it takes to take SRAT to space.
